TABLE.NAME: colibri_sessions
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to store the Colibri sessions information

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the parent course

FIELD.NAME: sessionuniqueid
FIELD.COMMENT: The session unique identifier

FIELD.NAME: sessionnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: The session number to access the session

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the resource

FIELD.NAME: moderationpin
FIELD.COMMENT: The moderation pin

FIELD.NAME: sessionpin
FIELD.COMMENT: The session pin

FIELD.NAME: startdate
FIELD.COMMENT: The time stamp of the beginning of the session

FIELD.NAME: enddate
FIELD.COMMENT: The time stamp of the end of the session

FIELD.NAME: maxsessionusers
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum number of session users

FIELD.NAME: listpubliclyoncolibri
FIELD.COMMENT: Show the session of the public session list on the Colibri website?

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: The state of the session (0=scheduled; 1=running; 2=ended)

FIELD.NAME: creatorid
FIELD.COMMENT: The identifier of the session creator

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp when the module was modified

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The introduction or description of the activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field

TABLE.NAME: colibri_sessions_users
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for registering the attendees of colibri sessions

FIELD.NAME: colibrisessionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The Colibri Session identifier

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user identifier

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Participation type (0=attendee; 1=moderator)

FIELD.NAME: reservedbyid
FIELD.COMMENT: The identifier of the user that reserved the seat for the user

FIELD.NAME: accessed
FIELD.COMMENT: Time stamp of the last access
